import './style.scss'; import React from 'react' import { ProdImage } from 'pages/Prods/Prod/parts/Image' import ProdLink from 'pages/Prods/Prod/parts/Link' import { f_class, f_cur } from "helpers/formatter" const Card = (props) => { const { prod, className, hideClaim, hidePrice } = props let currency = f_cur(prod.currency); return (
{prod.name}
{prod.price} {currency} {prod.oldprice} {currency}

{prod.claim}

) } export default Card
